Specimen Container(s): Double swab with tube containing elution reagent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert vanA Assay, a rapid automated PCR-based test to detect the vanA gene associated with vancomycin resistance in rectal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid qualitative detection of the vanA gene sequence associated with vancomycin resistance in bacteria from rectal swabs of patients at risk for intestinal colonization with vancomycin-resistant bacteria, to aid in recognition, prevention, and control of vancomycin-resistant organisms in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or treatment guidance.
